DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation use 2h-UG combined FPG , AGEsP alone combination FPG diabetes screen Chinese natural population
DOC.detailed_description: Using WHO criteria golden standard，drawing ROC curve 2h-UG combined FPG , AGEsP alone combination FPG，calculating area ROC curve .
DOC.criteria: 20~70 year old urban rural resident ; Volunteer participate study sign inform consent .
